Name: BD145
Notes: Round disk used to increase stamina or attack. Boost Mode only available when paired with 'Hell'

Name: D:D
Special Conditions: if (mode = 'attack') { attack = 5, defense = 1, stamina = 2 }, elif (mode = 'defense') { attack = 1, defense = 5, stamina = 3 }, elif (mode = 'stamina') { attack = 0, defense = 1, stamina = 5 }

Name: F:D
Notes: Tip automatically switches from SF to RHF when low stamina

Name: X:D
Notes: Changes tips between, XF, SF, and S. Paired with Diablo unlocks auto mode changes
Special Conditions: if (mode = 'attack') { attack = 6, defense = 1, stamina = 2 }, elif (mode = 'defense') { attack = 2, defense = 5, stamina = 3 }, elif (mode = 'stamina') { attack = 2, defense = 2, stamina = 5 }

Name: BD185
Notes: Round disk used to increase stamina and defense
